comments: Honestly, he was a good teacher. He was strict and didn\'t like talking, which is perfectly fine. It means he doesn\'t want to be disrespected. He jokes around and is fun to be around. He gives you study guides for the test and explains everything.
talks about his life most of the time. I only stayed in his class because of my huge interest in psychology. Not recommended to anyone, especially if your planning to take It at 8am

He is a very rude HARD ASS!!! careless about his students! talks constantly about his previous jobs and his personal life, holds himself higher then others and constantly told students "you know ur going to have to repeat my course next semester! Absoultly no encourgement!!!! I passed the class just because I had to PROVE HIM WRONG LOL!
NOT A SOCIOLOGY CLASS AT ALL, SEEMED MORE OF A CRIMINAL JUSTICE CLASS, CONSTANTLY TALKED ABOUT HIS PROBATION JOB. VERY RUDE AND DOESNT WORK WITH HIS STUDENTS IF A TOPIC IS UNCLEAR.
you have to do 10 one page movie assignments and your regular 80 question test midterm final all that good stuff. He tells the same stories and is kinda rude and a ****. Not approachable at all.
